$ echo "Sample plaintext" > sample.txt
$
$
$ ansible-vault encrypt sample.txt
New Vault password:
Confirm New Vault password:
Encryption successful
$
$
$ cat sample.txt
$ANSIBLE_VAULT;1.1;AES256
34343733313635373136303366333561663237343934343436646265633838363564393735633934
6164643730356631313833386465393231363065633866370a346139343531343565613964343837
65643731643839646632346562656430663936613031386238666166383466343332363739343762
3333333933643564650a636361356663323762393336663162613861356234323235313662653135
3762
$
$
$ ansible-vault decrypt sample.txt
Vault password:
Decryption successful
$ cat sample.txt
Sample plaintext
